long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pomodollar — your focus is priceless, your distractions have a cost. 

Welcome to Pomodollar — a Chrome extension that combines a Pomodoro timer, a website blocker and a concept of loss aversion to turn you into an ultimate productivity machine 🚀

Pomodollar adds a twist to the familiar work-break-repeat rhythm by introducing real stakes to keep you focused. 

The concept is simple:

Start the timer, block all the distracting websites during the work sessions and if you want to break your own commitment? Pay a dollar to end the work session earlier or delete a website from the blacklist. 

🤔 Why Pomodollar? 🤔 

🍅 Simple Yet Effective: 
Dive into 25 minutes of uninterrupted work followed by a 5-minute break. Rinse and repeat. It’s the Pomodoro technique, but with Pomodollar, there’s more on the line.

🍅 Real Stakes for Straying Thoughts: 
Tempted to wander off to a distracting website during work time? With Pomodollar, that momentary lapse could cost you a dollar. Stay on task, save your change.

🍅 Customisable Blocking: 
Our carefully curated list of fun websites keeps out distractions during work hours. Prefer a personalised list? Customise it to fit your unique challenges. 

🍅 Mindful Browsing: 
Unlike other tools that merely remind you to stay focused, Pomodollar makes you value your time. Think twice before you click, and make every internet journey a mindful one.

🍅 Multi-browser & multi-device accounts: 
You can use a single Pomodollar account across multiple browsers, windows and devices. You work sessions will be 100% synced. 

⚙️ How It Works ⚙️

Pomodollar isn’t just another productivity tool — it’s a pact you make with yourself to value your time and efforts. 

With no complicated plans or scheduling, it's simplicity and effectiveness wrapped in one.

First version of extension will allow you to: 

⏳ customize your work & break durations
🕓 schedule the postponed work sessions
👯 use Pomodollar on multiple devices and browsers at the same time
🛑 block distracting websites during work sessions 
💸 unblock the websites or end sessions earlier only after paying for your distraction 

Your time is worth more than you think! 
Learn to value it with Pomodollar 🍅
